bibl.title: A. A. De Meules v. John H. McGraw. Sheriff Statement
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p:
Office of the Sheriff of King County W. T. ss
I do hereby return to the Hon. C, H. Hanford Chief Justice of Washington Territory, that before the coming to me of the within writ the said A. A. De Meules was committed to my custody, and is detained by virtue of another writ, a copy of which is hereto annexed; the original of which I also herewith produced, nevertheless I have the body of the said A. A. De Meules before you at this time and place within mentioned as I am within commanded.
Dated at Seattle this 20th day of August 1889 J H McGraw
Sheriffs Fees. Service of Writ $1.00 Copy Committment .80 Travel 20 Return 50 .70 $2.50

Subscribed and sworn to before me this 20th day of August 1889. J H McGraw R M Hopkins Clerk
Sheriffs Fees. Service of Writ $1.00 Copy Committment .80 Travel 20 Return 50 .70 $2.50
